details.title: Design and experimental validation of knowledge-based constant false alarm rate detectors

authors.affiliation: DIET, Univ. degli Studi di Napoli "Federico ", Naples
authors.name: A. De Maio

authors.affiliation: DIET, Univ. degli Studi di Napoli "Federico ", Naples
authors.name: A. Farina

authors.affiliation: DIET, Univ. degli Studi di Napoli "Federico ", Naples
authors.name: G. Foglia

details.abstract: This paper deals with the design and the analysis of constant false alarm rate (CFAR) detectors exploiting knowledge-based (KB) processing techniques. The proposed algorithms are composed of two stages. The former is a KB data selector which, exploiting the a priori information provided by a geographic information system, chooses the training samples for threshold adaptation. The latter stage is a conventional CFAR processor. The performance of the new schemes is analysed in the presence of real radar data, collected by the McMaster IPIX radar, and compared with other common CFAR detectors. The results show that noticeable performance improvements can be obtained suitably exploiting the a priori information available about the sensed environment.

ieee.title: An adaptive threshold technique for the LR detector in K-clutter. Validation using IPIX radar
ieee.displayText: David Mata-Moya, Nerea del-Rey-Maestre, Maria-Pilar Jarabo-Amores, Jaime Martin-de-Nicolas, Jose-Luis Barcena-Humanes, "An adaptive threshold technique for the LR detector in K-clutter. Validation using IPIX radar", Instrumentation and Measurement Technology Conference (I2MTC) 2015 IEEE International, pp. 794-799, 2015.

ieee.title: A Novel Prescreening Method for Land-Mine Detection in UWB SAR Based on Feature Point Matching
ieee.displayText: Jun Lou, Tian Jin, Fulai Liang, Zhimin Zhou, "A Novel Prescreening Method for Land-Mine Detection in UWB SAR Based on Feature Point Matching", Geoscience and Remote Sensing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 51, pp. 3706-3714, 2013, ISSN 0196-2892.

ieee.title: Adaptive Detection of Distributed Targets in Compound-Gaussian Noise Without Secondary Data: A Bayesian Approach
ieee.displayText: Francesco Bandiera, Olivier Besson, Giuseppe Ricci, "Adaptive Detection of Distributed Targets in Compound-Gaussian Noise Without Secondary Data: A Bayesian Approach", Signal Processing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 59, pp. 5698-5708, 2011, ISSN 1053-587X.

ieee.title: The knowledge-based tracking using geographic information
ieee.displayText: Qinghua Li, Lingjiang Kong, Xiaobo Yang, "The knowledge-based tracking using geographic information", Radar (Radar) 2011 IEEE CIE International Conference on, vol. 1, pp. 777-780, 2011.

ieee.title: Knowledge-Aided Covariance Matrix Estimation and Adaptive Detection in Compound-Gaussian Noise
ieee.displayText: Francesco Bandiera, Olivier Besson, Giuseppe Ricci, "Knowledge-Aided Covariance Matrix Estimation and Adaptive Detection in Compound-Gaussian Noise", Signal Processing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 58, pp. 5391-5396, 2010, ISSN 1053-587X.

ieee.title: CFAR detector based on clutter partition in heterogeneous background
ieee.displayText: Haiyang Song, Shuping Lu, Wei Yi, Lingjiang Kong, "CFAR detector based on clutter partition in heterogeneous background", Signal and Information Processing (ChinaSIP) 2015 IEEE China Summit and International Conference on, pp. 288-291, 2015.

ieee.title: Adaptive Detection of Point-Like Targets in Spectrally Symmetric Interference
ieee.displayText: Antonio De Maio, Danilo Orlando, Chengpeng Hao, Goffredo Foglia, "Adaptive Detection of Point-Like Targets in Spectrally Symmetric Interference", Signal Processing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 64, pp. 3207-3220, 2016, ISSN 1053-587X.
